name: March of the Die
description:
This is our submission for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam!

March of the Die is a puzzle solving game where the player must navigate tiles using a die in order to reach the goal. 

The game uses the unique geometry of a die and it's sides in order to create interesting and complex puzzles. 

There are currently 11 handmade levels to play through, each showing new ideas or mechanics. 

-- How To Play --

  • Use the WASD or Arrow keys to move the dice in a direction.
  • Land on a numbered tile with the correct number facing down in order to progress.

Credits:

  • Programming & Systems Design by Maximillian Mandel
  • Audio & Sound Design by David Gormley
  • Art & Animation by Colby Sembrat and Maximillian Mandel
  • Level Design by Maximillian Mandel
